com.threecrickets.prudence.util
Class CssUnifyMinifyFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Restlet
      org.restlet.routing.Filter
          com.threecrickets.prudence.util.UnifyMinifyFilter
              com.threecrickets.prudence.util.CssUnifyMinifyFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Uniform
public class CssUnifyMinifyFilter
extends UnifyMinifyFilter

A Filter that automatically unifies and/or compresses CSS source files, saving them as a single file. Unifying them allows clients to retrieve the CSS via one request rather than many. Compressing them makes them retrievable faster.

Compression is done via CSSMin.

This filter can track changes to the source files, updating the result file on-the-fly. This makes it easy to develop and debug a live site.

Note that this instances of this class can only guarantee atomic access to the unified/minified version within the current VM.

Author:
Tal Liron
